ygData.subject: Re: Some thoughts
ygData.msgSnippet: I have something to present to everyone............Ive talked to a friend who has been playing since the beta..   And he told me that he saw it in a shop
ygData.messageBody:
I have something to present to everyone............Ive talked to a friend
who has been playing since the beta.. And he told me that he saw it in a
shop somewhere but he dosent remember where. Someone might have just sold
it to the shop keeper or There might be one out of the way shop keeper that
sells it. Maybe we should check everyplace that sells stuff just not in
the citys but the out of the way places like entrace to ro or the out of the
way shops....
